Home Departments Achievements Team

The Official Canister Satellite (CanSat) Team of DJ Sanghvi
Imagination Deployed

We build a fully functional miniature satellite integrated with space technology.

We participate each year at the annual International Cansat Competition , conducted by the American Astronomical Society (AAS) in collaboration with NASA.

Departments

Electronics

The Electronics Department tests, calibrates and integrates the system design of the CanSat along with looking after uninterrupted communication and intensive testing.

Coding

The Coding Department looks after the programming aspects of the Graphic User Interface which displays the real time plotting of data recieved from the sensors present in the CanSat.

Mechanical

The Mechanical Department caters to the testing, manufacturing and designings an aerodynamically sound CanSat which is tested for maximum efficiency.
